sentences.en: A racially mixed jury in Miami convicted Lozano of manslaughter, but an appellate court overturned the convictions.
sentences.cn: 在迈阿密，由多种族人士组成的陪审团裁决洛扎诺犯过失杀人罪，但上诉法庭推翻了该判决。

sentences.en: Any decision by any appellate body and the reasons therefore would be communicated in writing to the appellant, together with notification of any right to further appeal.
sentences.cn: 任何上诉机关做出的任何决定及其理由均需以书面形式告知上诉人，并附关于进一步上诉的任何权利的通知。

sentences.en: As the name implies, the courts of appeals have appellate jurisdiction.
sentences.cn: 顾名思义, 上诉法院有受理上诉的裁判权.

sentences.en: Case law - ( Also known as common law. ) Law established by previous decisions of appellate courts.
sentences.cn: 判例法, ( 也被当作普通法 ) 法律建立在上诉法院的先例上.

sentences.en: I hear it's real handy in appellate work.
sentences.cn: 我听说它对应付上诉非常有帮助.

sentences.en: If he were wrong, there was the Appellate Division to which the defense could resort.
sentences.cn: 要是他的决定有错误, 还可以上诉法院,被告可以到那里去申请.

sentences.en: In some recent years, law students who apply to clerk for federal appellate judges were hired almost two years before they would graduate and begin work.
sentences.cn: 近些年来，早在毕业和开始工作的几乎二年前，申请成为联邦上诉法官的职员的法律系学生就已被雇佣了。

sentences.en: It also has an appellate jurisdiction over stamp duty appeals.
sentences.cn: 此外,区域法院亦有上诉管辖权,可审理印花税上诉案件.

sentences.en: Other federal appellate courts have agreed with the government that one has no expectation of privacy in activity open to public view on city streets.
sentences.cn: 另一方面，其他几个联邦上诉法院却同意政府的意见，说任何个人在城市道路上活动即是对公众公开，因此不能指望享有隐私权。

sentences.en: Persons serving on the Appellate Body shall serve in rotation.
sentences.cn: 上诉机构人员任职应实行轮换.

sentences.en: September 15, China to the WTO Appellate Body to lodge an appeal.
sentences.cn: 九月十五日, 中国向世贸组织上诉机构提出上诉.

sentences.en: Some artists like to daub their colors on with appellate knife.
sentences.cn: 有些艺术家喜欢用调色刀着色.

sentences.en: The Appellate Body shall hear appeals from panel cases.
sentences.cn: 上诉机构应审理专家组案件的上诉.

sentences.en: The appellate court affirmed the judgement of the lower court.
sentences.cn: 受理上诉的法院维持下级法院的判决.

sentences.en: The appellate court affirmed the judgment of the lower court.
sentences.cn: 上级法院维持下级法院的判决.

sentences.en: The appellate court demanded the production of all documents.
sentences.cn: 受理上诉的法庭要求出示全部证据.

sentences.en: What can an appellate court do?
sentences.cn: 上诉法庭能做 什么 ?

sentences.en: What can an appellate judge do?
sentences.cn: 上诉法官能做 什么 ?

trans.tran_cn: （尤指法庭）上诉的，受理上诉的
